thread.title: Feel at home in the heart of historical Paris
thread.title_full: Feel at home in the heart of historical Paris - Review of Hotel Dupond-Smith, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: bernard u
title: Feel at home in the heart of historical Paris
text:
As a resident of France I have become a frequent guest of the Dupond-Smith. The hotel is perfectly located in the heart of the historical Marais, yet in a very quiet street. A small hotel - less than a dozen rooms - it is very cosy and has a lot of style (each room or suite that I have occupied was decorated differently and had a different character). As important if not more, the people are lovely and always dedicated to to make sure your stay is perfect. In a nutshell, every time I visit the DS I feel at home. Wherever you come from, do not hesitate, the DS will do a lot towards making your Paris stay a dream...
Room Tip: The room and suite on the top floor are smaller but very intimate See more room tips
